New Records: Cape Verde became the first team to qualify for the 2023 Africa Cup of Nations last-16
Key Match Events: Captain Ryan Mendes doubled their lead
Kevin Pina hammered a brilliant strike into the top corner
Pre-Game Insights: Nobody expected the Blue Sharks to win a group containing Egypt and Ghana with one game remaining
Cape Verde, who defeated Ghana, and Mozambique, who drew with Egypt, both entered this game full of confidence after strong opening performances
Post-Match Reflections: Cape Verde's victory secures top spot in Group B, ahead of former champions Egypt and Ghana, with one game remaining
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bebe made his Cape Verde debut in 2022, after previously representing Portugal at the youth level
